desc: Fly out fishing cabin in Northern Saskatchewan. This 3 bedroom cabin on Melgurd Lake is only accessible by plane. The fishing is unlike anything you have ever experienced. Walleye and Northern Pike are the main fish you will find. Modern amenities in the wilderness!

layout.text: Have the wilderness adventure of a lifetime with a getaway to Northern Saskatchewan. Whether you’re determined to reel in a monster Northern Pike or a tasty Walleye, you will not be disappointed!
